column4: is there a way to tell what program has a given port open on my system?
i'm not running anything on there explicitly other than the program that I want to run that's saying something's already there
yea but dns is a client thing that will fire up to reolve ip
so why is it listed as "LISTEN" in netstat
odd, i am looking at the mo
google, says that dnsmasq is a package in itself, you should be able to remove it
ahh - dnsmasq-base ... what is the command for finding out what depends on a given package
are you using libvirt for vitualbox?
have kvm install and was using virt-manager
well get rid of it then :)
